actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the extended recovery period applicable to the depreciation of tax-exempt use property leased to foreign persons or entities.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal, for foreign persons or entities, the extended recovery period applicable to the tax-exempt use of property available under the alternative depreciation system for certain properties.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the extended recovery period applicable to the depreciation of tax-exempt use property leased to foreign persons or entities.
